comments: Interleaving of A000051 and A000012. - Klaus Brockhaus, Jun 27 2011
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 489
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,2,-2).
prog: (MAGMA) [ n eq 1 select 2 else IsOdd(n) select 2*Self(n-2)-1 else 1: n in [1..70] ]; // Klaus Brockhaus, Jun 27 2011(MAGMA) I:=[ 2, 1 ]; [ n le 2 select I[n] else Abs(Self(n-1)-Self(n-2)-Self(n-1)*Self(n-2)): n in [1..70] ]; // Klaus Brockhaus, Jun 27 2011
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jun 05 2000
